general_advisory: Dry weather may prevail over the district of Puri for the next five days. Farmers are advised to irrigate their fields as there is a mildly dry condition. Various crop-specific advisories are provided for diseases and pest management.

advisory: To manage stem borer in paddy, use Trichogrammajaponicum card weekly for 6 times.
Apply insecticides like Cartap Hydrochloride or Chlorantraniliprole to control stem borer.
To manage stem rot in groundnut, drench soil with Validamycin or Captan + Hexaconazole.
During primary stage of pest infestation in mustard, spray Neem Based Pesticide.
Chemically spray Thiamethoxam, Acetamiprid, or Imidacloprid for pest management.
To manage powdery mildew disease, spray Sulphur, Hexaconazole, Propiconazole, or Penconazole.

Favourable conditions for Diamond Back Moth and Head Borer in late sown Cauliflower and Cabbage crops.
Collect and destroy caterpillars and spray Neem based Pesticide or chemical sprays.
Prevailing fog condition may increase Aphid infestation in tomato. Control with neem oil formulation or Flonicam.
To manage Epilachna Beetle, shake plants to dislodge grubs and spray neem-based pesticide or chemical sprays.
To control thrips in rose, spray Fenpyroximate or Abamactin.
